1013500.name: Fantasy Grounds - Moderns, Volume 9 (Token Pack)
1013500.description:
Moderns, Volume 9

Modernize your your game with Monster Grin's 176 unique tokens of modern day individuals, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists! Beautifully depicted characters artfully depict everything from robot corps generals to punk-rocker animal training ladies and more - they're all here waiting to add some modern flavor to your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who and bring your game up to date! Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Male Apocalypse Driver
  • Female Apocalypse Explorer
  • Male Robot Corps General
  • Male Herbalist
  • Male Officer
  • Male/Female Apocalypse Riot Zombie
  • Female Apocalypse Shooter
  • Female Apocalypse Punk Rocker Trainer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
